mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student_grade (student_id, course_id, type, score, exam_date, remark) VALUES (#{studentId}, #{courseId}, #{type}, #{score}, NOW(), #{remark})
mapper.select: SELECT g.id, g.student_id, g.course_id, COALESCE(ci.name, CONCAT('班级#', cl.id)) AS course_name, g.type, g.score, g.exam_date, g.remark FROM student_grade g LEFT JOIN classes cl ON cl.id = ( SELECT ce.class_id FROM class_enrollment ce WHERE ce.student_id = g.student_id LIMIT 1 ) LEFT JOIN class_info ci ON ci.id = cl.id WHERE g.student_id = #{studentId} ORDER BY g.exam_date DESC, g.id DESC
